attributes.action: Abolish the use of Scotsman on English Currency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do we have to endure the use of a relatively unknown scotsman on our currency??

Can we expect to see Paul Gascoigne on the Scottish £20 - I think not

The use of such a figure is totally inappropriate, a lot of places in England will not even accept Scottish currency
